channel.title: Unable to start the game
channel.description: I downloaded blackmesa and at first everything worked fine. But since I easily get headaches and become nauseated from games with head bobbing and motion blur, I wanted to see if I could turn it of and at the same time I increased the resolution. After this, the screen went black as it usually does when u change the resolution of a game, but this stayed so I had to ctrl+alt+del and terminate the process. I didn't think there was anymore to it and that i just had to keep playing on the lower resolution but now when i try to boot the game again it just closes as fast as I run it. help please :x

item.title: Unable to start the game
item.dc:creator: instinx
item.description:
go to here: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS\cfg
and delete config.cfg, now try playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to start the game
item.dc:creator: Infib
item.description:
I downloaded blackmesa and at first everything worked fine. But since I easily get headaches and become nauseated from games with head bobbing and motion blur, I wanted to see if I could turn it of and at the same time I increased the resolution.
After this, the screen went black as it usually does when u change the resolution of a game, but this stayed so I had to ctrl+alt+del and terminate the process.
I didnâ€™t think there was anymore to it and that i just had to keep playing on the lower resolution but now when i try to boot the game again it just closes as fast as I run it. help please :x
